name: Speed Check Light
description: Speed Check Light is a lightweight Internet testing tool. This application helps you to measure the downlink speed (download), uplink speed (upload) and delays in the transmission of packets (latency/ping/jitter). The program is equipped with a simple user interface and a multitude of configuration options. One of the major advantages of Speed Check Light tool is automatic adjustment of the testing algorithms to the type of your connection (WiFi or 2G/3G/4G LTE/5G mobile networks). This ensures a high accuracy of the results.  Additional features of Speed Check Light application:   the ability to select the default server,  history of results with detailed information about the tests,  IP/ISP address display,  ability to filter and sort your results according to various criteria,  two standard units (Mbps and kbps),  system clipboard and social networks handling (easy to publish the results on Facebook or Twitter),  low demand on system resources.
